text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- New laws on curbing hazardous chemicals in Bahrain.
- Bahrain reviewing health insurance system, but the government is committed to providing quality care, says official.
- Bahrain to host world tourism fair every year.
- Bahrain top business location, says British-based businessmen.
- Bahrain's new frigate Sabha arrives in Alexandria, Egypt, on its way to the island.
- Government plans to develop Bahrain Stock Exchange, commerce minister says.
